title: So who can we start to blame for our losses?
body:
In most recent Conquest games I have been in my Jungler has been rat shit useless. No ganks while the enemy teams ganks a lot. And it is not just me, other players in those games complain the same. In all those games I have had a lose.

In some games I get that retarded player who farms for 30 minutes, never joins the team and always runs first, yet always ends up with a positive score, presumably just to look good. In all those games the enemy stick together better and win the game.

In some games I have been scared to look at the scorecard and map, knowing it will make me want to give up. 10 minutes, 2 tower loses in both other lanes, teams falling behind with the enemy double or triple our score, game over.

I know I am the only constant denomination in all my games, but when my team ends with a score of 2/11, 3/11 and 1/10, how can it be my fault? In my last game I went 10/13 and had the wonderus AD who went 4/6 and farmed most of the game and only decided to start to join us when her support was already trying to surrender at every opportunity.

What has happened to this game? I have never felt more wanting to quit than ever, I no longer have fun playing this game, but I know I used to for many years enjoy most games and could deal with the raft of bad players, but it has gotten pretty bad recently.

> Still yourself only. Remember, the only common factor in all of your games is you.

this is the most retarded mindset ever.
some games are lost because of another person.
most games are lost because of the whole team.

Sure, this is true. But take this for example.

Three games, one was lost because of you and you know it. 2nd was lost because of the whole team. 3rd was lost because your ADC was 0/10 by 25 minutes solely from 2v2 lane fights. Not all of them was your fault right?

But there is nothing you can do to make sure that that ADC doesn't do the same thing next game. Nothing you can do to improve your 2nd game's team's gameplay at all. All you can do, is improve yourself. Blaming others is futile and is a waste of time. Knowing that there is ALWAYS something that YOU could have done better gives you a template for self improvement, thus increasing your chances of winning all your games thereafter.
